questions.text: I can't find the time to make healthy meals.
Dealing with food outside the home is difficult (eating at restaurants, eating at friends' houses, going to parties, eating at work).
I eat food just because it is there.
Sticking to my meal plan just seems too hard.
It is difficult to avoid high-fat foods.
I eat when I am bored or stressed.
My friends and family make it hard for me to stick to a healthy eating plan.
I am hungry when I follow a healthy eating plan.
I feel hopeless because I have tried and failed so many times.
